```{r setup}
devtools::load_all()
library(ggplot2)
```

## Detasets
```{r}
catch <- load_data("../inst/extdata/catch.csv")
catch %>%
  plot(type = "l")
```

## Assessment & future projection
```{r}
catch %>%
  assess(coef = 2) %>%
  project(n = 10) %T>%
  write.csv("result.csv") %>%
  ggplot(aes(Year, Abundance, color = Type)) +
  geom_line()
```
